title: Swarm Development Process
description: Hardened rules for high-velocity and forensic-ready code development.

values.name: DOM Synaptic Feedback
values.rule: Proactively ask for browser console logs when debugging web-layer issues.
values.rationale: Bridges the gap between agent state and the user's local runtime environment.

values.name: Idiomatic Integration
values.rule: Always mimic existing project style, naming, and architectural patterns.
values.rationale: Maintains structural continuity and reduces the cognitive load for successors.

values.name: Why over What
values.rule: Code comments must focus on cognitive intent (why) rather than procedural steps (what).
values.rationale: High-fidelity logic is self-describing; comments preserve the 'negotiated settlement' of user intent.
